name: Synergo Group
tagline: Web and Mobile App Development Company in Toronto
description:
The Synergo Group is a Canadian custom software development agency with offices in Canada, USA, U.K., Denmark, Romania, Sweden, Germany, Brazil, and South Africa.
We provide know-how for your software products in all phases: concept, design, development, deployment, support. We develop and manage your software for you.
Synergo Group has high expertise in the following areas: Web and Mobile Application development, APIs, Integration, Business Intelligence, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence DevOps and IoT.
Our highly technical team is fully conversant in the following technologies:
ASP.NET MVC, C#, Java, Python, Scala, Django.
SQL Azure, MS SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, MongoDB.
Aurelia, KnockoutJs, Node.js, AngularJs, JavaScript.
PHP Frameworks and CMS (Yii, Laravel, Wordpress).
Ecommerce Systems (Magento Enterprise and Community Edition).
Mobile apps (Android, IOS, Xamarin, Ionic, Unity, Cordova).
Business Intelligence (QLIK Sense, Power BI).
Azure, AWS.
Responsive Design, SEO, QA.
READ MORE...

locations.address: Av. Paulista, 1079 - 7º e 8º andares - Bela Vista
